page.title: 02 FARMING IN OUR AREA
page.content: In the twelve square kilometre rectangle approximately 93% of the land is open_space and 7% is built_up There are 19 farms in this area of land , most of which use their land for crop_growing although on Onchors farm approximately 31 acres is used for grazing cattle. The field facing Onchors farm is used to grow material for thatching roofs of local cottages. Some farmers own woods where game is kept for shooting. Farms in the area vary greatly in size. Some local farmers refused either to be interveiwed or to allow the public to view their premises. These were battery farmers who were concerned with the recent activites of the Animal Liberation Front. Land in this area could not be described as flat or uninteresting. The fields are divided by bushes.
